case.title: russian seeking ltr only ( ny)
case.text: Hello- I am seeking ltr with a mature, stable, down to earth guy. Please be a swm no younger than 35, residing in ny only. No smoking/drinking/drugs. NO games/nudity/perverts/married- I won't respond. Pls provide some basic info- I will delete e-mails without a message. Myself- single, no kids, 31, live in Brooklyn, russian- speaking. No need to ask if I'm real. Thnx.
